McDonald's CEO has resigned after almost 25 years at the fast-food chain...
...and will be replaced by its chief brand officer.
According to a press release from the company,...
...Don Thompson will step down from his position...
...at the top of the iconic restaurant business effective March 1st.

...and sit on the company's board of directors.
